terms.author: Author
terms.avatars_are_public_and_often_displayed_o: Avatars are public and often displayed on your website. Your avatar will be trimmed to a square automatically.
terms.caption: Caption
terms.cover_images_are_used_by_themes_to_provi: Cover images are used by themes to provide a unique visual experience for your website.
terms.dont_forget_to_change_your_password_the_: Don’t forget to change your password the first time you login.
terms.enter_a_description_for_users_who_cant_s: Enter a description for users who can’t see images.
terms.enter_a_url_if_you_want_the_image_to_lin: Enter a URL if you want the image to link somewhere.
terms.featured_posts_are_given_special_attenti: Featured posts are given special attention by your theme. Use this to make a post stand out from all the rest.
terms.follow_the_link_below_to_login_to_your_a: Follow the link below to login to your account.
terms.forgot_your_password_it_happens_sometime: Forgot your password? It happens sometimes.
terms.heading: Heading
terms.just_follow_this_link_and_youll_be_publi: Just follow this link and you’ll be publishing again in no time!
terms.label: Label
terms.logos_are_often_displayed_on_your_websit: Logos are often displayed on your website. Supported formats include GIF, JPEG, PNG, and SVG.
terms.metadata_is_used_by_search_engines_and_o: Metadata is used by search engines and other apps that link to your content.
terms.name: Name
terms.pages_dont_show_up_in_the_blog_index: Pages don’t show up in the blog index, but you can link to them from your navigation menu and other posts.
terms.passwords_need_to_be_at_least_eight_char: Passwords need to be at least eight characters long.
terms.paste_embed_code_or_a_url_here: Paste embed code or a URL here.
terms.please_check_your_email_for_further_inst: Please check your email for further instructions.
terms.please_login_again_to_complete_your_requ: Please login again to complete your request.
terms.post_things_faster_by_adding_this_page_t: Post things faster by adding this page to your device’s home screen.
terms.postleaf_can_backup_your_data_to_a_singl: Postleaf can backup your data, uploads, and themes to a single file. You should do this frequently, and keep a copy of the backup in a safe place.
terms.roles_determine_what_features_a_user_has: Roles determine what features a user has access to.
terms.share_a_few_sentences_about_yourself: Share a few sentences about yourself.
terms.slugs_must_start_with_a_letter_and_can_o: Slugs must start with a letter and can only contain letters, numbers, and dashes.
terms.sorry_but_i_cant_seem_to_process_this_im: Sorry, but I can’t seem to process this image.
terms.sorry_but_i_cant_seem_to_send_an_email_a: Sorry, but I can’t seem to send an email at the moment.
terms.sorry_but_something_isnt_working_right_a: Sorry, but something isn’t working right at the moment. Please try again later.
terms.sticky_posts_show_up_first_in_your_blog_: Sticky posts show up first in your blog index so visitors will be sure to see them.
terms.the_link_you_followed_is_no_longer_valid: The link you followed is no longer valid.
terms.the_requested_page_could_not_be_found: The requested page could not be found.
terms.the_requested_resource_could_not_be_foun: The requested resource could not be found.
terms.the_title_provides_additional_informatio: The title provides additional information about a link, often in the form of a tooltip.
terms.this_code_will_be_injected_into_every_pa: This code will be injected into every page by the [helper] helper.
terms.this_email_address_is_already_in_use: This email address is already in use.

terms.this_is_not_a_valid_email_address: This is not a valid email address.
terms.this_slug_is_already_in_use: This slug is already in use.
terms.this_username_is_already_in_use: This username is already in use.

terms.upload_a_backup_file_to_restore_your_web: Upload a backup file to restore your website to a previous version. Postleaf will restore everything it can from the file you provide.
terms.usernames_must_be_lowercase_and_can_only: Usernames must be lowercase and can only contain letters, numbers, and dashes.
terms.website_icons_are_displayed_in_browser_t: Website icons are displayed in browser tabs and bookmarks. Square PNG images with transparent backgrounds work well.
terms.you_are_not_authorized_to_make_this_requ: You are not authorized to make this request.
terms.your_backup_could_not_be_restored_from_t: Your backup could not be restored from this file.
